entry.content:
We've been busy looking into new ways to integrate the Auctions plugin with a web-based GUI. We're currently working on Java WebSockets, and looking into the potential of using service workers to allow push notifications to be sent when a bid is ending, or when you have been outbid.

These features will require a server to be running HTTPS, however do not require intensive server-side processing.

We are also looking into the possibility of utilizing custom advancement messages for notifications. If that proves fruitful, we will develop a custom AdvancementAPI for ease of use in other plugins.

Development is incredibly slow thanks to real life events having to take precedence, however we will continue working on Frostfire Auctions.

entry.content:
We've taken down the old Frostfire Magic modpack, and reworked the entire modpack to load faster, run faster, and feel smoother. We are planning on releasing it through Technic's Solder application, however for the time being it will be hosted through Bitbucket's LFS system.

If you're interested in playing the new version, you can find all the information on our Frostfire Magic page, by either using the navigation bar, or clicking HERE.

entry.content:
As of today, we have a new website. Hosted on Bitbucket until further notice, and using simple static pages to reduce load times, as well as offer better mobile support.

This will be the location for all announcements, as well as updates on any of our projects.

We apologize for not having a proper website for upward of a year while many of our projects were on hiatus.
